    • buyCard

      public void buyCard​(String username, int x, int y, int cardPosition)
      Send a message to All players when a player buys a card
      Parameters:
      username - name of the player
      x - coordinate x of the card the player wants to buy in the Card Market
      y - coordinate x of the card the player wants to buy in the Card Market
      cardPosition - position where player wants to store the card in the Production Pane

    • buyResources

      Parameters:
      username - name of the Player
      position - value of the Resources

    • storeResource

      public void storeResource​(String username, Marble.Color color, int shelfPosition)
      Send a message to All players when a player Deposit Resources
      Parameters:
      username - name of the Player
      color - identifies the Marble that the player wants to deposit
      shelfPosition - identifies where the player wants to deposit the Marble

    • moveResources

      public void moveResources​(String username, int firstShelf, int secondShelf)
      Send a message to All players when a player Move Resources
      Parameters:
      username - name of the player
      firstShelf - Identify the shelf from which the player wants to move resources
      secondShelf - Identify the shelf where the player wants to move resources

    • basicProduction

      public void basicProduction​(String username, Marble.Color input_1, Marble.Color input_2, Marble.Color output)
      Send a message to All players when a player use a Basic Production
      Parameters:
      username - name of the player
      input_1 - identifies the Marble that the player wants to use
      input_2 - identifies the Marble that the player wants to use
      output - identifies the Marble that the player wants to receive

    • cardProduction

      cardPosition - position of the card in the Production Pane
